title: League Client Lags then Bugsplats
body:
Whenever I'm in lobby and go to the runes tab in collection, the client just starts lagging immensely and continues to do so in champion select.
I can make the whole client permanently lag by first going into lobby, opening the ranked tab in profile and then switching the runes tab in collection.
Eventually in both cases the client bug-splats.

Anyone else have issues like this/when doing this or is it just me?

replies.body:
Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.

Already tried that prior to re-installing, guess I'll have to submit a ticket.
EDIT: Also forgot to try hex-tech repair tool, I'll give that a shot first.

It's possible it's something specific to your computer rather than your client, but tech isn't really my area. Only other thing I can think of would be to make sure your GPU drivers are up to date. Past that, support will know much more than I do.
Thanks for the quick response, my GPU drivers are up to date, and it only started occurring in patch 9.7. Hex tech Repair Tool didn't seem to fix the problem so I submitted a ticket in the end.
